description: You have been trained since a young age in the warfare of ancient Greece.  You start with Pankration.
You have been trained since a young age in the warfare of early medieval Europe.  You start with Medieval Swordsmanship.
You have been trained since a young age in the warfare of fuedal Japan.  You start with your choice of Niten Ichi-Ryu or S≈çjutsu.
You have been trained since a young age in the warfare of early modern Europe.  You start with Fencing.
You have been trained since a young age in the ways of late medieval warfare.  You start with your choice of Fior De Battalgia or Medieval Swordsmanship.
